title: "AI helping airlines forecast weather to reduce flight delays"
excerpt: "The nation’s airlines are navigating a summer of weather extremes including record heat, rain, tornadoes, lightning and historic flooding. NBC News’ Tom Costello has more details on how artificial intelligence is now helping to micro-forecast the weather to help cut flight delays."

  - title: "Weather forecasting is having an AI moment"
    excerpt: "Using AI to predict weather has a big advantage: it’s fast. Traditional forecasting models are big, complex computer algorithms based on atmospheric physics and take hours to run. AI models can create forecasts in just seconds."
